title: Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa
raw_text: ===== main placeholder ========================================== Subclass 489 Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa For skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia You can bring your family If you are granted this visa, you might be able to apply for the Skilled Regional (Permanent) visa (subclass 887) Basic Eligibility See the relevant pathway Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) Invited pathway This is a temporary visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa is closed to new applications.​ Stay 4 years Cost From AUD4,770.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) Extended stay pathway This is a temporary visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia You must hold a subclass 475, 487, 495 or 496 visa Stay 4 years from the date your current skilled visa was granted Cost From AUD435.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) Subsequent entry pathway This visa is for a member of the family unit of someone who holds a Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) or a subclass 475, 487, 495 or 496 visa. ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia You must be a member of the family unit of someone who holds a 475, 487, 489, 495 or 496 Stay Until the visa that your family member holds ends. Cost From AUD4,910.00 Processing Time For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the visa processing time guide tool . This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application. Details
main_content:
===== main placeholder ==========================================

Subclass 489

Subclass 489

# Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa

Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa
- For skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia
For skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia
- You can bring your family
You can bring your family
- If you are granted this visa, you might be able to apply for the Skilled Regional (Permanent) visa (subclass 887)
If you are granted this visa, you might be able to apply for the Skilled Regional (Permanent) visa (subclass 887)

### Basic Eligibility

Basic Eligibility

See the relevant pathway

See the relevant pathway
Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489)

## Invited pathway

Invited pathway
This is a temporary visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia.

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa is closed to new applications.​

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​This visa is closed to new applications.​
Stay

4 years

4 years
Cost

FromAUD4,770.00

From
AUD4,770.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489)

## Extended stay pathway

Extended stay pathway
This is a temporary visa. It is for skilled workers who want to live and work in regional Australia.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia
- You must hold a subclass 475, 487, 495 or 496 visa
You must hold a subclass 475, 487, 495 or 496 visa
Stay

4 years from the date your current skilled visa was granted

4 years from the date your current skilled visa was granted
Cost

FromAUD435.00

From
AUD435.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use the
visa processing time guide tool
. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
Details
Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489)

## Subsequent entry pathway

Subsequent entry pathway
This visa is for a member of the family unit of someone who holds a Skilled Regional (Provisional) visa (subclass 489) or a subclass 475, 487, 495 or 496 visa.
- ​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia
​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​​You need to live, work and study in specified regional areas of Australia
- You must be a member of the family unit of someone who holds a 475, 487, 489, 495 or 496
You must be a member of the family unit of someone who holds a 475, 487, 489, 495 or 496
Stay

Until the visa that your family member holds ends.

Until the visa that your family member holds ends.
Cost

FromAUD4,910.00

From
AUD4,910.00
Processing Time

For an indication of processing times for this visa, use thevisa processing time guide tool. This will show the processing times for recently decided applications. It is a guide only and not specific to your application.
